sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-navigation-drawer
    v-model="drawer"
    app
    fixed
    clipped
    class="rounded-be-lg"
    :temporary="false"
  >
    <v-list dense>
      <v-list-item
        v-for="(item, index) in sidebarItems"
        :key="index"
        :value="item"
        :to="item.url"
        @click="updateSidebar"
      >
        <v-list-item-title v-text="item.title"></v-list-item-title>
        <template v-slot:prepend>
          <v-icon :icon="item.icon"></v-icon>
        </template>
      </v-list-item>
    </v-list>
    <v-divider class="pa-2"></v-divider>
    <v-expansion-panels variant="inset" class="pb-10">
      <v-expansion-panel v-model="panel">
        <v-expansion-panel-title>Users</v-expansion-panel-title>
        <v-expansion-panel-text>
          <v-list>
            <v-list-item
              variant="plain"
              v-for="(item, index) in users"
              :key="index"
              :value="item.name"
              :to="item.url"
              append-icon="mdi-arrow-right"
            >
              <v-list-item-title>{{ item.name }}</v-list-item-title>
            </v-list-item>
          </v-list>
        </v-expansion-panel-text>
      </v-expansion-panel>
    </v-expansion-panels>
  </v-navigation-drawer>
</template>
<script>
import { useTheme } from "vuetify";
import { mapState } from "vuex";
import store from "@/store";

export default {
  name: "NavigationComponent",
  data() {
    return {
      sidebar: true,
      theme: useTheme(),
      darkMode: false,
      sidebarItems: [
        { title: "Home", url: "/", icon: "mdi-home-outline" },
        { title: "Settings", url: "settings", icon: "mdi-cog-outline" },
        { title: "Register", url: "register", icon: "mdi-account-plus" },
        { title: "Login", url: "login", icon: "mdi-login" },
        { title: "About", url: "about", icon: "mdi-information-outline" },
      ],
      users: [
        { name: "Mico", url: "/" },
        { name: "Stella", url: "/" },
        { name: "Ben", url: "/" },
        { name: "Mico", url: "/" },
        { name: "Stella", url: "/" },
      ],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    changeTheme() {
      this.darkMode = !this.darkMode;
      this.theme.global.name = this.darkMode ? "darkMode" : "lightMode";
    },
    updateSidebar() {
      store.dispatch("updateDrawer", {
        drawer: !this.drawer,
      });
    },
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState(["drawer"]),
  },
};
</script>
<style scoped></style>
